name: Akeor
desc: An archeologist's assistant from the Children of Echoes.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Excavation is hard work, but it's often followed by unexpected joy. Of course, this joy doesn't always come from the treasures unearthed. Sometimes, it comes from the sudden blow your opponent's card suffers in a Genius Invokation TCG match.
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc:
"Mottled Gold Yet Unsmelted" Kachina

Wrought of tears and mettle.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc:
"Ardent Flames Forge the Soul" Xilonen

The peaks resound, their golden veins gleaming.

customize.name: Dehya
customize.desc:
"Flame-Mane" Dehya

The eyes of the vulture, the soul of the lion, the free daughter of the desert.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

value.name: Guide to Contention
value.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

Though humans cannot fly at the speed of winged beasts, nor match the flexibility of slimes, yet still, they have their own unique strengths. Sometimes, understanding both why and how to compete is the key to knowing oneself.
